description: After you've washed the dishes and put the kids to bed, there's nothing better than relaxing in a hot bath. Let Delta help you soak the day away with one of our distinctive roman tub faucets.

Just like ocean waves, the one-piece curved handles and sleek spout of Lahara(R) make a lasting impression.
